description:
During a break between battles, Luffy is attacked by an angry rival, but a beautiful gladiator with mysterious motives offers him food - and a place to rest.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy and the Gladiator of Fate: Rebecca!
Luffy et la gladiatrice à l’étrange destinée, Rebecca !
Luffy to Shukumei no Ken Toushi Rebecca
ルフィと宿命の剣闘士レベッカ
